name: William the Running Box - beta01
description:
Hey all! This is my new game, called "William the Running Box" and it is my first game using Unity Engine. Guide a Blue Box named William through 4 worlds which contain obstacles. Each world contains 3 levels and each level has increased speed.

To play the game double click the "William the Running Box" application file found in the folder.

NOTE : The game is playable but it is still in beta version.

Created by George Katsianos aka Winterwolf Icewind.
